question: Show me all contacts
description: Basic query to list all contacts with essential information

question: List all accounts with their status
sql: SELECT TOP 15 a.[RECORD_ID], a.[ACCOUNT_NAME], a.[ACCOUNT_STATUS_NAME], a.[EMAIL_ADDRESS] FROM [ACCOUNT] a
description: Query to show accounts and their current status

question: Show contacts and their associated accounts
sql: SELECT TOP 15 c.[RECORD_ID], c.[CONTACT_NAME], c.[EMAIL_ADDRESS], a.[ACCOUNT_NAME] FROM [CONTACT] c LEFT JOIN [ACCOUNT] a ON c.[ACCOUNT] = a.[RECORD_ID]
description: Join query between contacts and accounts using foreign key relationship

question: Get all events with their sessions
sql: SELECT TOP 15 e.[RECORD_ID], e.[EVENT_NAME], es.[SESSION_NAME], es.[START_TIME] FROM [EVENT] e LEFT JOIN [EVENT_SESSION] es ON es.[EVENT] = e.[RECORD_ID]
description: Join query showing events and their associated sessions

question: Show abstracts submitted for events
sql: SELECT TOP 15 ab.[RECORD_ID], ab.[TITLE], ab.[CONTACT_NAME], e.[EVENT_NAME] FROM [ABSTRACT] ab LEFT JOIN [EVENT] e ON ab.[EVENT] = e.[RECORD_ID]
description: Query showing abstracts with their event information

question: List all users in the system
description: Basic query to list system users

question: Show members and their membership type
sql: SELECT TOP 15 a.[RECORD_ID], a.[ACCOUNT_NAME], a.[MEMBER_TYPE_NAME], a.[MEMBER_STATUS_NAME] FROM [ACCOUNT] a WHERE a.[MEMBER_TYPE] IS NOT NULL
description: Query showing member accounts with their membership details

question: Get contact activities
sql: SELECT TOP 15 ca.[RECORD_ID], ca.[ACTIVITY_TYPE_NAME], ca.[ACTIVITY_DATE], c.[CONTACT_NAME] FROM [CONTACT_ACTIVITY] ca LEFT JOIN [CONTACT] c ON ca.[CONTACT] = c.[RECORD_ID]
description: Query showing contact activities with contact information

question: Show invoices with account details
sql: SELECT TOP 15 i.[RECORD_ID], i.[INVOICE_NUMBER], i.[INVOICE_DATE], i.[TOTAL_AMOUNT], a.[ACCOUNT_NAME] FROM [INVOICE] i LEFT JOIN [ACCOUNT] a ON i.[ACCOUNT] = a.[RECORD_ID]
description: Query showing invoices linked to accounts

question: List products and their categories
sql: SELECT TOP 15 p.[RECORD_ID], p.[PRODUCT_NAME], p.[PRODUCT_CODE], pc.[CATEGORY_NAME] FROM [PRODUCT] p LEFT JOIN [PRODUCT_CATEGORY] pc ON p.[PRODUCT_CATEGORY] = pc.[RECORD_ID]
description: Query showing products with their category information

question: Find accounts by area
sql: SELECT TOP 15 a.[RECORD_ID], a.[ACCOUNT_NAME], a.[AREA_1_NAME], a.[BILLING_ADDRESS_TOWN] FROM [ACCOUNT] a WHERE a.[AREA_1] IS NOT NULL
description: Query to find accounts filtered by geographic area

question: Show recent donations
sql: SELECT TOP 15 d.[RECORD_ID], d.[DONATION_AMOUNT], d.[DONATION_DATE], c.[CONTACT_NAME] FROM [DONATION] d LEFT JOIN [CONTACT] c ON d.[CONTACT] = c.[RECORD_ID] ORDER BY d.[DONATION_DATE] DESC
description: Query showing recent donations with donor information

question: Get abstract reviews and reviewers
sql: SELECT TOP 15 ar.[RECORD_ID], ar.[ABSTRACT_NAME], ar.[APPROVED], rev.[CONTACT_NAME] FROM [ABSTRACT_REVIEW] ar LEFT JOIN [ABSTRACT_REVIEWER] rev ON ar.[EVALUATED_BY] = rev.[RECORD_ID]
description: Query showing abstract reviews with reviewer details

question: Show email campaigns with their status
sql: SELECT TOP 15 ec.[RECORD_ID], ec.[CAMPAIGN_NAME], ec.[STATUS_NAME], ec.[SEND_DATE] FROM [EMAIL_CAMPAIGN] ec ORDER BY ec.[SEND_DATE] DESC

question: List opportunities by stage
sql: SELECT TOP 15 o.[RECORD_ID], o.[OPPORTUNITY_NAME], o.[STAGE_NAME], o.[EXPECTED_VALUE], a.[ACCOUNT_NAME] FROM [OPPORTUNITY] o LEFT JOIN [ACCOUNT] a ON o.[ACCOUNT] = a.[RECORD_ID]
description: Query showing sales opportunities with account information
